column1: With the dangerous rise in coronavirus cases across the state the California Department of Health has issued a Limited Stay at Home order effective 11/21-12/21. See below for more information and please do your part to #stopthespread. https://t.co/36MBDu8sY4 https://t.co/PojeKSyX80
